name: mindx-engineer-onboarding
description: MindX Engineer Onboarding - Full Stack Application

scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && docker build -t mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-frontend:latest . && az acr login --name mindxtien2026 && docker push mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-frontend:latest && cd .. && kubectl set image deployment/week1-frontend frontend=mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-frontend:latest && kubectl rollout status deployment/week1-frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && docker build -t mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-api:latest . && az acr login --name mindxtien2026 && docker push mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-api:latest && cd .. && kubectl set image deployment/week1-api week1-api-container=mindxtien2026.azurecr.io/week1-api:latest && kubectl rollout status deployment/week1-api
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
